title: Design and Analysis of Online Project-Based Science Learning Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in a non-face-to-face digital environment, emphasizing learner interaction and technology tool adaptation as core elements. Operated primarily through summative assessments.

learning_goals: Students can complete over three science projects within six months using online collaboration tools (BeachBoard, Zoom, etc.)
Learners can analyze online learning satisfaction factors with 80% accuracy through peer and self-assessment in a project-based learning environment.
Learners can achieve 90% understanding of science content and 85% or higher efficiency in utilizing technical tools in a digital device-provided environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
